nodes.text: The military does not use shotguns? Please check the army's new shotgun: http://www.benelliusa.com/firearms/m4.tpl

I believe I said the military does not use sawed off shot guns, and then I said it does use other forms of shot guns. You have never did explain why you as a gun owner defends every gun control law Sarah Brady wants! There is a name for people like you and I believe it is traitor!
